suncertify.db

Interface BookingDB

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DB
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookingData, BookingDataProxy

    public interface BookingDB
extends DB
    An extended version of the DB interface to provide specific functionality required for the URLyBird Application.
    Author:
    Nick Shrine

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SEARCH_TYPE_AND
      Search type whereby all criteria must match.
      static int SEARCH_TYPE_OR
      Search type whereby any criteria matching will return a match.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] findExact(java.lang.String[] criteria, int operator)
      Returns records that exactly match the specified criteria.

      • Methods inherited from interface suncertify.db.DB

        create, delete, find, lock, read, unlock, update

    • Field Detail

      • SEARCH_TYPE_AND

        static final int SEARCH_TYPE_AND
        Search type whereby all criteria must match.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SEARCH_TYPE_OR

        static final int SEARCH_TYPE_OR
        Search type whereby any criteria matching will return a match.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • findExact

        int[] findExact(java.lang.String[] criteria,
                int operator)
        Returns records that exactly match the specified criteria. An operator type must be specified to determine the type of matching to be done.
        Parameters:
        criteria - the criteria to be matched.
        operator - the type of match to be performed, either AND or OR.
        Returns:
        an array of record numbers that match the specified criteria.
